question: A non Muslim had the following dream about me. Should I be concerned?
answer:
QUESTION
"YOUR CAR WAS SMASHED QUITE BADLY. IT WAS A WEIRD DREAM COS MY UNCLE WHO PASSED AWAY WAS ALSO THERE. TAAEBA'S CAR WAS VERY BAD THOUGH. I COULD SEE BLOOD EVERYWHERE. THEY WERE USING JAWS TO CUT TAEBA OUT OF THE CAR.TAABA FATHERS CAR WAS SMASHED SO BADLY - IT LOOK LIKE A CRUMPLED BALL OR SOMETHING.I THINK SOMETHING BAD IS GONNA HAPPEN I HAVE THIS FUNNY FEELING IN ME."
ANSWER


Share:
At the outset, we wish to remind you that our Imaan is on Taqdeer
(predestination). What is meant to happen will certainly happen and what is
not to happen, will certainly not happen.

We advise you give some Sadaqah (charity) and make Du'aa to Allah Ta'ala.
Insha Allah, the dream will have no effect.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
